comments: I found this professor very interesting and engaging. He spent extra time to ensure understanding and integration of information. His grading was fair and reasonable.

I am extremely disappointed with my experience in Don\'s class. I came into this program feeling very excited to learn about some good study tips and all I\'ve got from this teacher is rudeness. It\'s unfortunate that I got him this early in the year because it\'s really affected what I think about Stenberg College as a school.
If you don\'t expect anything, you won\'t be disappointed. Remember, keep your expectations low!
